content: Home | Akarsh PrabhakaraI am an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Sciences at the University of Wisconsin - Madison since 2025. I am also affiliated with the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering.My research interests broadly lie in wireless systems and cyber-physical systems.
